::Halucigen::
As Halucigen fleed in his divebomb he felt the connection to Iron
Raptor through Prowl. He quickly calmed himself and did a quick scan
on her mind learning a little more info...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
>
> * Iron Raptor kept her gun trained on Imprisoner, glaring at him
before her
> vision suddenly blacked out, panicing because she suddenly thought
that she
> fainted...but she was aware of what was going on.
> Images flashed in her mind, but from the feelings that went along with
> them...the only one who could feel such anguish for her death was Prowl.
> At Megatron's hands she'd fallen in his mind, but in her own she
thought of
> such a fate to be unlikely.
> < I'd kill him first.> she answered those images.
> But hate was what she felt from Prowl, sensing his soul struggling even
> though all she saw was what he did, and not any physical image of
his form.
> But this was just his mind, thoughts...and he felt that they were real.
> So real! < This isn't real!> she shreeked in her own mind, hearing
it echo
> across the images in Prowls. Though, she was saying that for her own
sake,
> since she almost felt her own mind slipping into the same illusion.
> Anger...helplessness, that was the strongest feels that he felt, so
she felt
> it as well. Trapped, not knowing what to do. Everything was lost!*
>
> " NO!"
>
> * Was what she shouted before dropping to her knees and clenched her
fists,
> the gun falling to the ground, but in her mind everything was in slow
> motion.
> Opening her eyes, everything slowed, the booms of explosions went on
for
> minuelts instead of seconds, angry voices were muffled, the slow and
steady
> beat of her spark ringing in her ears.
> < Isn't real, isn't real. NO!>
> In the back of her mind, something awoke.
> SCM: < Mwahahahahahahahahhhhhhhhhhh!!! Welcome to MY world!>
> She could feel Prowl's transformation, slow like the world around
her, and
> painful to her. Though, pain as in a numb throb, like her body was
heating
> up inside of the armor and seering the skin.
> < Prowl!> weak as a whimper as that was, it echoed in her mind as Prowl
> continued to transform.
> But it wasn't only happening to him, but the SBM in her own systems was
> struggling to join in on that transformation. But, she had a better
grip on
> hers and fought will with will.
> < No! I might be able to controle you but you sap too much power,
leave me
> weak.>
> SBM: < Come on! Let me out!...you know you want to.>
> < No I don't! You're horrid!>
> SBM: < Only blood thirsty. Nothing wrong with that, come on.> it pushed.
> < No!>*
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
